snippet.title: RIDE YOUR MIND - The NeuroVR Game -  Concept Trailer
snippet.description:
RIDE YOUR MIND [RYM] is the PhD Project of Jens M Stober from RMIT University's GEElab Europe. It is an artistic, hackish, neurofeedback, real-time virtual reality game or, in brief, a NeuroVR Game that forces the user’s conscious to compete with his subconscious.

The NeuroVR Game RYM is generated by neurofeedback collected by an EmotivEEG Brain Computer Interface (BCI). The game environment gets responsively designed by the actual neuronal data. An Oculus Rift Head-Mounted Display (HMD) displayes the playable visualisation of the users brain. 

http://www.rideyourmind.com
